words.prompt: ____________ is the scattered remains of something.
If you say something with ____________ , you use special force or stress.
An ____________ is an unexpected meeting.
A son, father, and grandfather are three ____________ who all have a common family ancestor.
Yesterday he ____________ , or showed a sign, that he was willing to help us.
A ____________ is a person who specializes in the study of things in nature.
If a rock ledge is ____________ , it is steep.
The magic show was ____________ because it was very impressive.
If you can ____________ something, you have enough money to pay for it.
A ____________ is money borrowed.
____________ is the amount of money left after all business costs have been paid.
When you ____________ , you do well and become successful.
____________ is the chance of loss or harm.
____________ is money set aside for the future.
When something is ____________ , it is difficult to get or find.
____________ are payments received for work done
If you ____________ information, you get it from a source, such as the Internet.
When you ____________ , you move forward or make progress.
An ____________ is a careful examination or study of something.
When you ____________ something, you mention it as proof or evidence.
A ____________ is an opposing, or disagreeing, point of view.
____________ are facts, figures, and other kinds of information.
____________ are problems or disadvantages.
____________ is having the ability to think in a logical way.
